projects.title: TextFilter App
projects.description1: Whether it is Twitter, Facebook, Yelp or just a note to co-workers or business officials, what you say is as important as how you say it. And how many characters you use.
projects.description2: This 'TextFilter' app lets you remove punctuations from your texts, capitalize or lowercase your entire texts remove extra spaces and lines and also count the number of characters in your text.
projects.description3: This web app was build using Django at the backend and HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: Crypto
projects.description1: Cryptocurrency and blockchain is dubbed as the next big thing. Investing at the correct time has seen some investors turn millionaires in a short span of time. This is a perfect app to keep a check on some of the hottest cryptocurrencies in the market
projects.description2: The 'Crypto' app gives you accurate information about the latest prices of some of the most hottest cryptocurrencies in the market. The simple design makes the data easy to interpret and read even for a newbie!
projects.description3: This web app was build using Angular as the frontend framework, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing and REST web Apis to get real time data. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: PhoneBook App
projects.description1: A PhoneBook application to store contact details of peers and friends.
projects.description2: This 'Phonebook' application made using Angular to display, add, delete phonebook records.The records display the complete dio data of the contacts stored.
projects.description3: This web app was build using Angular as the frontend framework, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing. For backend we get data from an endpoint json server. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: Student Performance Prediction and Risk Factor Identification
projects.description1: The welfare of our society is maintained by providing high-quality education. The potential to predict a student's performance is very important in educational environment.
projects.description2: The focus of this study was to use machine learning techniques to create classifier system capable of determining a particular student’s likelihood of academic success or failure based on their background information and past academic performance. The analysis concluded that the SVM classifier models developed in this study are capable of accurately predicting a student’s likely academic performance following the inclusion of data detailing their First Term grades.
projects.description3: Here Matlab was used for developing SVM classifier models. Please find the report in the source link below

projects.title: CurrencyXchange
projects.description1: With the never ending inflation and the fears of the next recession to arrive soon, here is a app where you can keep a watch on how your currency is performing compared to other international currencies.
projects.description2: The 'CurrencyXchange' app gives you accurate information about the latest conversion rates of the 180 world currencies with comparasion to USD. The simple but designing helps accurate and quick readablity!
projects.description3: This web app was build using Angular as the frontend framework, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing and REST web Apis to get real time data. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: Computer Graphics
projects.description2: These are web pages displaying interactive 3-D animations. Here there is an animation of moon revolving around the earth and also a 360 degree view of landscape. Here, I extensive used of WebGL and three.js views and lighting to give desired effects
projects.description3: This website was build using three.js, javaScript, HTML5, CSS3, WebGL. You can find the Screen Captures of the website and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: Airplane App Redesigning
projects.description1: User interface and User experience is one of the important metrics of a product's success.
projects.description2: Here I redesigned the Virgin Atlantic mobile application into a user-friendly, interactive interface by following agile methodology and guidelines, and having timelines for UX prototyping and user testing with emphasis on improving the usability of the app. Conducted heuristic evaluation, improvised based on the evaluation and implemented the changes to add value to the application interface.
projects.description3: This app was build using MIT App inventor. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.description1: This is an ongoing project where I am building a clone of the E-commerce retail giant Amazon.
projects.tools: Java, Spring Boot, Angular, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap

projects.title: Patatap Clone
projects.description1: This a fun application, where I attempted to clone the famous 'Patatap' website
projects.description2: Here on every keystroke we get a animation on the screen and a music note is played.
projects.description3: his website was build using jQuery, JavaScript and HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: To-Do App
projects.description1: Need to manage your tasks better? Worry not we got your back!
projects.description2: This ToDo web app allows you list tasks and cross out the completed tasks. So now you can keep a track of completed task and pending tasks for the day, so you can sleep peacefully at night assured of completing all your tasks.
projects.description3: This web app was build using jQuery, javaScript and HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description2: This calculator can add, substract, multiply, divide and also find the percentage of the entered numbers.
projects.description3: This Gui application was build using Java Swing. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.

projects.title: QuickNews
projects.description1: This is the best place for a quick peek at what is happening all around the world.
projects.description2: The 'QuickNews' app allows you to navigate between headlines, sport, business, technology and Entertainment news.
projects.description3: This web app was build using Angular as the frontend framework, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap for designing and REST web Apis to get latest data. You can find the Screen Captures of the app and the Source Code links below.
